page.title: 07SADBERGE ROAD SAFETY PATROL
page.content:
Mrs Holland is our crossing patrol lady but we call her our "lollipop lady"because the stick she uses to halt the traffic with while we cross the road looks like a giant lollipop. Mrs Holland gets up at 7.30am and is ready to go out to do her job by 8.30.She wears a white coat and hat so that motorists can see her easily especially on a dark mornings in the winter.Her lollipop stick is black and yellow and has the words in big letters.{STOP CHILDREN CROSSING.}Mrs Holland sees all the children across the busy road at 9am,12 noon,1pm,3pm and at 3.30pm. After the end of the afternoon school Mrs Holland's job is finished for that day.
by LISA WALKER AGE 10
